General.Name: Mex Polska S.A.
General.Description: Mex Polska S.A. develops, owns, operates, manages, and franchises restaurants primarily in Poland. It operates bistros and restaurants under the The Mexican, PanKejk, and Prosty Temat, and Pijalnia Wódki i Piwa name. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Lódz, Poland.
General.Address: ul. Polskiej Organizacji Wojskowej 25, Lódz, Poland, 90-248

3.Name: Mr. Dariusz  Kowalik
